changelog.title: Konami Code Restored
changelog.description: The ancient cheat code now works across all browsers. Arrow keys no longer scroll during input.

changelog.title: Factionless Shortcut
changelog.description: Those who choose everything on Q2 reveal their true nature instantly. The algorithm recognizes the boundless.

changelog.title: Sorting Diagnostics
changelog.description: Enhanced debugging for the sorting ceremony. The algorithm now reports its decisions more clearly.
